content: I am a Ph.D. student in Electrical and Computer Engineering at Georgia Tech, who is being advised by Prof. Saibal Mukhopadhyay. My research interests include intelligent hardware and memory compiler. I am currently working on developing machine learning accelerator with processing in memory.

title: Daehyun Kim
